name: Volon Therys
summary: Volon Therys is a town on the eastern continent. It lies on the west bank of the Rhoyne. During the second spice war, the town faced a battle against the host of Prince Garin the Great.Almost directly across the river to the east lies the ruined city Sar Mell. To the north is Valysar, to the west, the Orange Shore and to the south along the Rhoyne, Volantis.[1]
